Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2010 10:58PM MTB42 wrote: I finished chemo on Dec. 1, 2009 (taxotere, cytoxan and herceptin - the herceptin and Femara continue).  Still have some neuropathy in my toes and alot of nosebleeds, although that could perhaps be the herceptin.  While my fingernails were wonderful during treatment, just now - three months afterward- my big toenails are getting loose and hurting.  I'm hoping they don't fall off.  Anyone else have this problem?
Posts.Title: in the years after TC treatment limegreen hrf
